backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all core data types (Product, Order, Cart, Review, etc.) and application state maps, with mixins for storage and authorization, counters for IDs, and a hard-coded admin principal fallback.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms the old actor state (with HARD_CODED_ADMIN_PRINCIPAL) to the new state shape (with nullable adminPrincipal set to null).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the admin auto-registration authentication flow feature to its implementing frontend files and associated test/component dependencies.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON document containing short summaries of all frontend source files, describing each component, page, hook, and style file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file importing Tailwind directives and defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including sidebar, chart, and destructive variants.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the Mosslight Studios app, mounting the React app at the #root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with all application routes (public and admin), wrapped in ThemeProvider, AdminAuthProvider, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Full-page access denied UI component with a shield icon, descriptive message, and a button to navigate back to the home page.
Cart button component that handles quantity input and variant selection validation before calling the addToCart mutation, showing appropriate error toasts for inventory or selection issues.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Route guard component that shows a loading skeleton while checking admin status, renders AccessDeniedScreen for non-admins, and renders children for authenticated admins.
Modal dialog component for admin authentication that accepts an 8-digit passcode, calls the login hook, and navigates to the admin dashboard on success.
frontend/src/components/AdminNotificatio: Displays unread admin and low-inventory notifications in a card panel, with a button to mark each notification as read.
frontend/src/components/AdminReplyForm.t: Form component visible only to admin users that allows posting a reply to a specific discussion board post.
Form for authenticated users to submit a new question to the discussion board, with loading and auth-state feedback.
frontend/src/components/CustomerMessages: Renders a list of messages sent to a customer from Mosslight Studios, distinguishing broadcast announcements from direct messages.
frontend/src/components/DiscussionPostLi: Displays a sorted list of discussion posts as clickable cards showing the question, status badge, timestamp, and reply count.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer component showing social media links, copyright year, and a 'Built with caffeine.ai' attribution link.
frontend/src/components/GalleryItem.tsx: Renders a single gallery card with optional media image, content text, and records a content-view analytics event on mount.
frontend/src/components/GalleryUploadFor: Form for uploading gallery content including text and media files, with upload progress tracking and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky site header with navigation links, cart icon with item count badge, notification bell, admin login modal, and Internet Identity authentication controls.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapper that renders the Header, a main content area via React Router's Outlet, and the Footer.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button component for Internet Identity login/logout that also displays a truncated principal ID with a copy-to-clipboard action when authenticated.
Admin form card for composing and sending broadcast messages to all customers, with recipient type selection and loading state handling.
frontend/src/components/MessageHistory.t: Displays a list of previously sent messages as cards, showing timestamp, broadcast/direct badge, content, and optional recipient info.
frontend/src/components/MyOrderCard.tsx: Card component showing a single customer order with its items, variant details, per-line totals, order date, and status badge.
frontend/src/components/NotificationBell: Dropdown notification bell that fetches unread notifications, displays them with type-specific icons and relative timestamps, and marks them as read on click.
frontend/src/components/OrderList.tsx: Admin order list with search filtering by order ID or customer, and an inline status selector to update each order's status.
frontend/src/components/OrderStatusBadge: Small badge component that maps an OrderStatus value (pending, shipped, delivered) to a styled Badge variant and label.
Badge component that renders a forum post's status (open or answered) with corresponding color styles.
frontend/src/components/PrincipalDisplay: Displays the authenticated user's Internet Identity principal in a banner with a copy-to-clipboard button and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Renders a product card with image, name, price, stock badge, and star rating, linking to the product detail page and recording analytics on click.
frontend/src/components/ProductFilterSid: Sidebar component that derives available filter options (categories, price ranges, colors, sizes) from the product list and exposes toggle/clear controls for active filters.
frontend/src/components/ProductForm.tsx: Form for creating or editing a product, supporting fields for name, SKU, description, price, inventory, images, variants, and tag inputs for categories/colors/sizes.
frontend/src/components/ProductReviews.t: Displays a list of product reviews with star ratings, verified-purchase badges, and timestamps, along with an aggregate average rating summary.
frontend/src/components/ProductSearch.ts: Provides a search input and price-range dropdown that filter a product list in real time and notify the parent via a callback.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that collects a new user's name, email, and shipping address on first login and saves the profile via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/ReplyList.tsx: Renders a sorted list of reply cards, each displaying an admin badge and formatted timestamp alongside the reply content.
frontend/src/components/ReviewForm.tsx: A form component for authenticated users to submit a star rating and text review for a given product, with validation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/SocialMediaLinks: Displays icon links to Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok profiles for Moss Light Studios.
frontend/src/components/VariantManager.t: A CRUD UI component for managing product variants (size, color, price, inventory) with inline editing, validation, and toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.tsx: A React context provider that manages admin authentication via both a hardcoded passcode (stored in localStorage) and Internet Identity, exposing login/logout and initialization state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnalytics.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch aggregated analytics data (clicks, views, revenue, orders, low inventory) and to record individual analytics events.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Provides React Query hooks for viewing the cart, adding items, clearing the cart, and checking out, with cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerMessages.t: A React Query hook that fetches the authenticated user's messages from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerOrders.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch all orders or a single order for the authenticated customer.
frontend/src/hooks/useDiscussionBoard.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching all discussion posts, a single thread, creating a new post, and adding a reply.
frontend/src/hooks/useGallery.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch social media content and a stub mutation for uploading new content (not yet implemented in the backend).
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state and persisting identity across page reloads using DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessages.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching messages and sending a message to a recipient via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching unread notifications and marking a notification as read via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching orders and updating an order's status via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching, adding, updating, and deleting products, with permission and authentication error handling for admin-only mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductVariants.ts: Exports a React Query hook for fetching product variants for a given product ID from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useReviews.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching product reviews with average rating and submitting a new review via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile and retrieving their user role from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind CSS and defines CSS custom properties for the Mosslight Studios brand color palette in both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page displaying Mosslight Studios' story, mission, and contact/social media links.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAnalyticsPage.ts: Admin page displaying analytics metrics including total revenue, order count, product clicks, content views, and low inventory alerts, protected by AdminGuard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard landing page showing navigation cards for all admin sections (products, orders, messages, gallery, forum, analytics) along with a notifications panel.
frontend/src/pages/AdminGalleryPage.tsx: Admin page for uploading and managing gallery/social media content, wrapping the GalleryUploadForm component inside an AdminGuard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMessagesPage.tsx: Admin page with tabs for composing new customer messages and viewing message history, protected by AdminGuard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminOrdersPage.tsx: Admin page that fetches and displays all customer orders using the OrderList component, protected by AdminGuard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminProductsPage.tsx: Admin page for managing the product catalog with the ability to add, edit, and delete products, toggling between a product grid and a ProductForm.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page that displays cart items with product details, calculates totals, and provides options to clear the cart or proceed to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout page that displays pre-filled shipping info from the user profile and a demo payment form, placing an order on submission and redirecting to an order success page.
frontend/src/pages/FAQPage.tsx: Renders a static FAQ page organized into four categories (Shipping, Returns, Product Care, Ordering) using an accordion component for collapsible Q&A items.
frontend/src/pages/ForumPage.tsx: Displays a discussion board page with a question submission form and a list of recent community questions fetched via the useDiscussionPosts hook.
frontend/src/pages/ForumThreadPage.tsx: Shows a single forum thread detail page with the original question, its replies, and an admin reply form, fetched by post ID from the URL params.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Renders a gallery page displaying social media content items in a responsive grid, along with social media follow links, fetched via useGetSocialMediaContent.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page featuring a hero section with background image, a three-feature highlights section, and a call-to-action section linking to the products and gallery pages.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Authenticated account page showing the user's orders and messages in tabs, with a profile setup modal for new users and an access denied screen for unauthenticated visitors.
frontend/src/pages/OrderSuccessPage.tsx: Confirmation page displayed after a successful order, showing the order ID and buttons to navigate to orders or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Product detail page that displays product info, variant selectors (size/color), pricing, stock status, add-to-cart button, and a reviews section with a review submission form.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Displays a paginated product collection page with text search and sidebar filters (category, price, color, size) applied in combination. Fetches products via a custom hook and renders them as ProductCard components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading URL query parameters (supporting both standard and hash-based routing), persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom colors (emerald/nude palette, semantic tokens via oklch), typography, border radius, shadows, fonts (Playfair Display, Inter), and accordion animations, with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state at version 3, describing an app with Internet Identity login that auto-registers the first login as admin, with one pending backend feature request (AR-1) and one completed frontend feature.
